channel.title: PI Rename items
channel.description: If I wanted to rename a castlewars ticket to like 1b ticket, how would I do that? I've tried google they're all about renaming ints.

item.title: PI Rename items
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:2, topic:398566”]First open up ItemDef.java. Then get the ID of the castle wars ticket. Now make a new case in ItemDef.java like this (the #### marks will be your ID.

case ####:

Now we will add the part of the snippet that will change the name and examine information of the item. (pretty self explanatory)

case ####:
itemDef.name = "";
itemDef.description = "";

Then we are going to end the snippet with a breaker which will keep the snippet from continuing on (basically like saying “the end”).

case ####:
itemDef.name = "";
itemDef.description = "";
break;

Save and compile and your done. (:[/quote]

Thanks alot! This helped me so much even though its simple.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Rename items
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

First open up ItemDef.java. Then get the ID of the castle wars ticket. Now make a new case in ItemDef.java like this (the #### marks will be your ID.

case ####:

Now we will add the part of the snippet that will change the name and examine information of the item. (pretty self explanatory)

case ####:
itemDef.name = "";
itemDef.description = "";

Then we are going to end the snippet with a breaker which will keep the snippet from continuing on (basically like saying “the end”).

case ####:
itemDef.name = "";
itemDef.description = "";
break;

Save and compile and your done. (:

Read full topic
